subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Steve Begin scored twice and the Long Island native Christopher Higgins added a goal and an assist to lead the Montreal Canadiens to a 4-1 victory over the host Islanders last night.
snippet: Steve Begin scored twice and the Long Island native Christopher Higgins added a goal and an assist to lead the Montreal Canadiens to a 4-1 victory over the host Islanders last night.
